Text:
One of the reviewers who I respected most, Harris Goldsmith, in the old High Fidelity Magazine would always start his reviews of the 5 Beethoven Piano Concerti with the statement that Leon Fleisher with George Szell and the Cleveland Orchestra had the definitive versions of these concerti in modern sound. Now I will get a chance to heat if this is true for myself!
Thank you for this post.

if that is right, i want to check it
pls seed
thanq
Not much chance of a seed, it seems. this is a shame as these concerti by Fleischer and Szell are highly regarded, tho I haven't heard them but would like very much too. Here's hoping LOL
